title: Add mobile number in the app footer

requirements.text: Add the mobile number "9973279335" at the bottom of the app by displaying it in the global footer (below the main content) in English.

quotes:
Add mobile number at the bottom 
9973279335

acceptanceCriteria: The footer shows the text "Mobile: 9973279335" on all pages/states (guest, customer, admin).
The mobile number is placed within the existing footer area (no overlap with main content) and remains readable on mobile and desktop.
The displayed mobile number exactly matches: 9973279335.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
nonGoals: Do not add or change backend (Motoko) logic.
Do not add authentication, contact forms, or messaging/calling integrations beyond displaying the number.
